name: Pitch-Shift Artifact Demo
description: Demonstrates pitch-shifting artifacts at extreme ranges. Listen for formant shift (chipmunk effect), unnatural attacks, and quality inconsistency.

tracks.name: French Horn - Chromatic (Problem: 17st gap)
tracks._comment: Notes at -12 to -6 require 8+ semitone shift from C1 sample - listen for chipmunk effect

tracks.name: 808 Kick - Pitched Up (Problem: single sample)
tracks._comment: Base note is 36. +18 semitones sounds unnatural - outside playable range

tracks.name: Marimba - Wide Melody (Problem: 17st gap)
tracks._comment: Large gaps between samples cause quality inconsistency across range

tracks.name: Piano - Reference (Octave spacing OK)
tracks._comment: Same melody on piano for comparison - octave spacing is acceptable

listenFor: French Horn: Formant shift (chipmunk effect) on low notes
808 Kick: Unnatural attack and timbre when pitched up high
Marimba: Quality inconsistency between notes near vs far from samples
Piano: Reference - should sound more consistent despite same octave spacing
